name: Desert Dash (itch) (M. DeVs)
description:
CONTROLS BELOW: 

SPACE to attack, Up and Down Arrows to move.

Attacking will destroy anything except a cactus.

Attacking a monster (the weird thing with a mouth) causes an extra fruit to appear.

Score/Highscore = how much life you have past your starting health.

------------------------------------

3rd "1-day" project where you dodge the hazards of the desert in order to grind for the fruit that raises your health. How long will you last in the endless desert? 

I put "1-day" in quotes because I kinda did a little bit art one day, moved on, and then came back to finish two days later lol. I mean the total time was still probably under 24 hours, so ig it counts 

Also, all the art uses the same color pallet, which for me is 8 colors. Thought you should know lol
